# Sunridge Hospital
> Leading multi-specialty hospital in Hyderabad providing comprehensive healthcare services

## About
Sunridge Hospitals is a patient-centric neighborhood hospital chain delivering tertiary-level standards of care in a warm, community-first environment. We offer advanced medical facilities with expert doctors across multiple specialties.

## Medical Specialties
- Cardiology
- Neurology
- Orthopaedics
- Gastroenterology
- Hepatology
- Pulmonology
- Urology
- Gynaecology
- ENT (Ear, Nose, Throat)
- Internal Medicine & Diabetology

## Services
- 24/7 Emergency Care
- Advanced Diagnostic Services
- In-patient Care
- Out-patient Consultations
- Surgical Procedures
- Critical Care Unit
- Laboratory Services
- Radiology & Imaging

- **Hours**: Open 24/7
